# OBJECT::HIDE_PORTABLE_PICKUP_WHEN_DETACHED

## Summary
Sets the pickup to remain hidden when detaching from a dead ped. Calling this with false will make a detached pickup visible again

## Parameters
* **OBJECT_INDEX** pickupID
* **BOOL** hide
